projects.title: SetupInSaudi
projects.subtitle: Compliance-First SaaS Platform
projects.description: Leading development of a B2B SaaS platform automating legal workflows for business setup in Saudi Arabia. Achieved 83 paying clients in the first month post-launch.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive compliance-first SaaS platform that streamlines business setup and payments in KSA. The platform handles everything from document management to government portal monitoring, ensuring full compliance with Saudi regulations.

keyFeatures.title: E-invoicing Integration
keyFeatures.description: Automated Saudi e-invoicing with Xero, Marmin, and ZATCA integration

keyFeatures.title: Payment System
keyFeatures.description: Multi-channel billing with Checkout.com, Stripe, and automated tracking

keyFeatures.title: OCR Service
keyFeatures.description: Google Gemini-powered document processing and data extraction

keyFeatures.title: Government Monitoring
keyFeatures.description: Real-time monitoring of QIWA, MISA, MUQEEM portals with alerting

keyFeatures.title: Document Management
keyFeatures.description: Automated expiration tracking, classification, and audit trails

keyFeatures.title: Employee Management
keyFeatures.description: Saudization tracking, visa status, and WPS-compliant payroll

projects.title: Prevent Scripts
projects.subtitle: Digital Health Platform
projects.description: Developed backend systems for a digital health platform that raised $5M in seed funding, enabling seamless integration of patient behavior tracking and biometric monitoring.
projects.longDescription: Built comprehensive backend infrastructure for a digital health platform focused on preventive care. The system integrates patient behavior tracking, biometric monitoring from mobile applications, and personalized action plans to improve health outcomes.

keyFeatures.title: Patient Behavior Tracking
keyFeatures.description: Seamless integration of patient behavior monitoring and analytics

keyFeatures.title: Biometric Monitoring
keyFeatures.description: Real-time biometric data collection from mobile applications

keyFeatures.title: Provider Tools
keyFeatures.description: Clinic workflow optimization and patient management systems

keyFeatures.title: API Optimization
keyFeatures.description: Reduced analytics API response time from 8s to 900ms

keyFeatures.title: Healthcare Analytics
keyFeatures.description: Advanced analytics for improved healthcare delivery efficiency
